parse.title: The Lord of the Rings/Publication history and gallery seven-volume

links.*: The Lord of the Rings/Publication history and gallery one-volume
The Lord of the Rings/Publication history and gallery three-volume

wikitext.*:
Here listed are the seven-volume editions of '''''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'''''. In 1999, HarperCollins released a "Millennium edition" of ''The Lord of the Rings'', consisting of seven volumes which were originally conceived by J.R.R. Tolkien, with book titles suggested by him: # ''The Ring Sets Out'' # ''The Ring Goes South'' # ''The Treason of Isengard'' # ''The Ring Goes East'' # ''The War of the Ring'' # ''The End of the Third Age'' # Appendices File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999.jpeg|1999 hardcover boxed set File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2000.jpg|2000 paperback boxed set File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001.jpg|2001 paperback boxed set File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012.jpeg|2012 paperback boxed set ==1999-2000== File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v1.gif|vol. 1 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v2.gif|vol. 2 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v3.gif|vol. 3 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v4.gif|vol. 4 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v5.gif|vol. 5 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v6.gif|vol. 6 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 1999-v7.gif|vol. 7 * [[1999]]: [[HarperCollins]], hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0261103873 (set) - (Millennium edition) ** volumes: ISBN 0261103938, ISBN 0261103946, ISBN 0261103954, ISBN 0261103964, ISBN 0261103970, ISBN 0261103989, ISBN 0261103997 ** Includes a CD of Tolkien reading excerpts from ''The Lord of the Rings'' and notes by George Sayer * [[2000]]: [[HarperCollins]], paperback in slipcase, ISBN 0007105002 (set) ** A paperback boxed set was issued in 2000, after the hardcover edition had gone out of print ** The cover and ISBN of each volume are the same as the 1999 edition ==2001== File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v1.gif|vol. 1 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v2.gif|vol. 2 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v3.gif|vol. 3 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v4.gif|vol. 4 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v5.gif|vol. 5 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v6.gif|vol. 6 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2001-v7.gif|vol. 7 * [[2001]]: Collins, paperback in slipcase, ISBN 0007124015 (set) - (film tie-in edition) ** volumes: ISBN 0007635613, ISBN 0007635559, ISBN 0007635605, ISBN 0007635583, ISBN 0007635591, ISBN 0007635575, ISBN 0007635567 ==2012== File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v1.jpeg|vol. 1 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v2.jpeg|vol. 2 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v3.jpeg|vol. 3 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v4.jpeg|vol. 4 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v5.jpeg|vol. 5 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v6.jpeg|vol. 6 File:The Lord of the Rings SV 2012-v7.jpeg|vol. 7 * [[2012]]: [[HarperCollins]], paperback in slipcase, ISBN 0007489978 (set) - (film tie-in edition) ** The ISBN of each volume is the same as the 2001 edition
